Title: CakePHP SecurityComponent cross form submission issue
Description: Prior to versions 2.4.8 and 1.3.18, forms secured by SecurityComponent could be submitted to any action without triggering SecurityComponentâ€™s tampering protection. If an application contained multiple POST forms to manipulate the same models, it could be vulnerable to mass assignment issues.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.3.0 before 1.3.18, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.4.8
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.3.0, all versions starting from 1.3.18 before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.4.8
